name: guide

scripts.build:render: node ../dist/pdf-document-maker.js render --base-dir `pwd` --template-header template-header.html --height-header 20mm --template-footer template-footer.html --height-footer 20mm --partial-dir partials --layout-dir layouts-pdf --document-dir documents --lesscss style.css.less --pdf-output PDF --html-output out --title 'PDF Document Maker Guide' --format A4 --funcs ./mahafuncs.mjs guide/guide.md
scripts.watch:site: npx nodemon -e less,md,css,html,png,mmd --watch assets --watch documents --watch layouts --watch partials --exec npm run build:site
scripts.watch:guide: npx nodemon -e less,md,css,html,png,mmd --watch assets --watch documents --watch layouts-pdf --watch partials --exec npm run build:guide

author: David Herron <david@davidherron.com>
description: Documentation website for the PDF Document Maker application
